name: Sunset Hotel
description:
Welcome to the Sunset Hotel! As Los Angeles’ finest five-star resort, we’ve got everything you could possibly need for a nice, relaxing getaway. Take in the sights as you enter through our grand lobby, soak up the sun as you relax by our magnificent pool, grab a bite to eat at our world-class restaurant, and, of course, spend a relaxing evening in one of our 4000 guest rooms. Our staff is always there if you need anything, so don’t hesitate to take advantage of our 24 hour room service! Feeling lucky? Check out our brand new casino, and discover why our guests never leave for Vegas ever again. Or, if you’re looking to be entertained, look no further than Serling Memorial Theater, and marvel at the elegant routines and death-defying stunts of Cirque des Étoiles (performing weekends at 6:30pm and 11:30pm)! Come see what makes our guests want to stay here forever. Thank you for choosing Sunset Hotel; we hope you enjoy your stay!

Sunset Hotel is a top-down adventure where players must explore and solve puzzles in order to escape the game’s mysterious namesake. Inspired by the Eagles song Hotel California and the Tower of Terror attraction at Disney’s Hollywood Studios, with gameplay inspired by the Legend of Zelda series. 

Made for a game design class at West Virginia University
